content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

--Check if there is any PulocationID is null
SELECT
    count(*) as total_count,
    count(PULocationID) as not_null_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


--Get borough name from taxi zone data
SELECT
    *
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK '/taxi_zone.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    FIRSTROW = 2
    ) 
WITH (
    location_id SMALLINT 1, 
    borough VARCHAR(15) 2, 
    zone VARCHAR(50) 3, 
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
) AS [result]

--calculate number of trips made from borough
SELECT
  taxi_zone.borough,
  trip_data.PULocationID,
  count(1) as number_of_trips
FROM
  OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
  ) AS trip_data
  JOIN OPENROWSET(
    BULK '/taxi_zone.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    FIRSTROW = 2
  ) WITH (
    location_id SMALLINT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
  ) AS taxi_zone ON taxi_zone.location_id = trip_data.PULocationID
GROUP BY
  taxi_zone.borough,
  trip_data.PULocationID
ORDER BY
  trip_data.PULocationID;
